description:
Mathilde Saint-Omer is the previous owner of the title "Flame-Haired Burning-Eyed Hunter", is shown in the flashbacks leading to the ceremony of Shana`s ascent as a Flame Haze. She was Wilhelmina Carmel`s friend and companion. They were together regarded as the greatest pair, rivaling the "Pair of Wings", a counterpart of the Crimson Lords Merihim and Illuyanka. She was in love with Alastor.
Source: shakugan.wikia.com
name: Mathilde Saint-Omer
